a gentleman uses his mouth and not his fist

definition: people of good will (idiom); charitable person

definition: a nobleman's word is his bond (proverb)
pinyin: jun1 zi3 yi1 yan2 , si4 ma3 nan2 zhui1

definition: good people are at peace with themselves, (but) there is no rest for the wicked

containing_words.word: 君子坦荡荡，小人长戚戚

definition: lit. for a nobleman to take revenge, ten years is not too long (idiom)/fig. revenge is a dish best served cold
pinyin: jun1 zi5 bao4 chou2 , shi2 nian2 bu4 wan3

definition: lit. a nobleman stays clear of the kitchen (idiom, from Mencius)/fig. a nobleman who has seen a living animal cannot bear to see it die, hence he keeps away from the kitchen

sentences.english: He's a deadbeat and a hypocrite.
Esquire magazine named her the best voice in the history of pop music.
sentences.chinese: 君子杂志称她的嗓音是流行音乐历史上最好的声音。

sentences.english: I'm like a junkie wanting a proper fix these days.
sentences.chinese: 我这些天就像个瘾君子一样等着给我来支强心剂。
他是世界第一的伪君子。

sentences.english: What the gentleman worries about is the Way and not poverty.
sentences.chinese: 君子忧患的是没有学问而不忧患贫困。

sentences.english: He has been labelled a " druggie".
sentences.chinese: 他被贴上“瘾君子”的卷标了。

sentences.english: It's my position that gentlemen should reason thing out rather than resort to force.
sentences.chinese: 我主张君子动口不动手。

sentences.english: Now, the Hulks has got its gentleman again, through me.
sentences.chinese: 现在监狱船又经过我的手把这个正人君子请回了。

sentences.english: Soon, before a pothead dies at booth.
sentences.chinese: 不久之后，一名瘾君子死于电话亭前。

sentences.english: The police are always urged to crack down on drug addicts.
sentences.chinese: 人们总是敦促警察好好治治吸毒瘾君子。

sentences.english: Dr. Townsend was a drug addict.
sentences.chinese: 汤森特医生是个嗜药成癖的瘾君子。

sentences.english: I understand why you stole, because you're a junky .
sentences.chinese: 我明白你为什么要偷，因为你是个瘾君子。

sentences.english: Sadly, gentlemen's agreements only work between gentlemen.
sentences.chinese: 可悲的是，君子协定只在君子间有效。

sentences.english: Sadly, gentlemen's agreements only work between gentlemen.
sentences.chinese: 可悲的是，君子协定只在君子间有效。

sentences.english: To remain unsoured when others do not know of you , is that not after all what is expected of a gentleman?
sentences.chinese: 人家对我不了解我尔我却不生气，不也是君子么？

sentences.english: They are, to a man, the greatest pack of hypocrites in football.
sentences.chinese: 这群人就是足球界中最恶劣的一群伪君子。

a sage/wise and holy man/virtuous ruler/Buddhist lama/wine
kindhearted and moderate (idiom); temperate and gentle

to preserve a proper behavior in private life

moral integrity/unflinching righteousness
not shaken by poverty/to preserve one's ambitions although destitute
